snippet: Investors have reached an agreement in principle to invest in Airbnb, valuing the site at about $10 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Friday.
abstract: Investors have reached an agreement in principle to invest in Airbnb, valuing the site at about $10 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Friday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: TPG and Others Said to Agree to Invest in Airbnb
